paper.title: Cover's Algorithm Modified for Nonparametric Estimation of a Log-Optimal Portfolio Selection Function
paper.abstract: Cover's algorithm yields an iterative portfolio choice for maximizing expected log investment return where the distribution function of the stock market vector is known. In the case that the stock market vectors form a stationary ergodic sequence with unknown distribution, by stochastic approximation and nonparametric regression estimation the algorithm is modified for iterative estimation of a log-optimal portfolio selection function of the last d observed vectors (fixed d is an element of N) on the basis of an observed training sequence of vectors. Under a boundedness and a mild alpha-mixing condition, a strong consistency result is established.

domain_result.justification: 该论文的核心技术是修改Cover's算法，用于非参数估计对数最优投资组合选择函数，这直接涉及投资组合的构建和优化，属于投资组合管理领域。
